meanings.definition: A cold dish of various mixtures of raw or cooked vegetables, usually seasoned with oil, vinegar, or other dressing.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating salads with fresh lettuce and tomatoes.
meanings.sent2: At the picnic, everyone brought a different type of salad to share.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tomato blush? Because it saw the salad dressing!
meanings.sent4: Her colorful salad was a work of art on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the salad made it look like a rainbow on the table.

meanings.definition: A mixture of raw or cooked vegetables, fruits, meats, fish, cheese, or other ingredients, usually served with a dressing.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious salad with grilled chicken and avocado.
meanings.sent2: During the party, guests enjoyed a variety of salads with different toppings.
meanings.sent3: Why did the grape stop rolling down the hill? It ran into the salad bowl!
meanings.sent4: The salad of flavors in her dish perfectly complemented each other.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the fresh salad filled the room with a delightful fragrance.
